review: We are very pleased with the Fire Stick since we had been unable to access Amazon Prime heretofore (I cannot explain why, but the experts say it is so).  Also, now able to access Netflix from a TV that wasn't as smart as our main television.  Wish we had gotten in at the Prime Day pricing!
author: DA "Donna A"

review: Love how many choices I have to watch anything. And it's so easy to connect. Definitely worth the money.
author: Pipes7491

review: Can anyone contact me.  It doesn't seem to be functioning properly
author: Patricia

review: I love it! Easy to hook up, and easy to use!
author: Jessie

review: Works really well have enjoyed it
author: Karen Boursaw
